body.div:
So strange an accident has happened to us, that I cannot forbear recording
Upon hearing this he appeared satisfied, and consented to come on board. Good God! Margaret, if you had seen the man who thus capitulated for his safety, your surprise would have been boundless. His limbs were nearly frozen, and his body dreadfully emaciated by fatigue and suffering. I never saw a man in so wretched a condition. We attempted to carry him into the cabin; but as soon as he had quitted the fresh air, he fainted. We accordingly
brought him back to the deck, and restored him to animation by rubbing him with brandy, and forcing him to swallow a small quantity. As soon as he
By slow degrees he recovered, and ate a little soup, which restored him wonderfully. “Then I fancy we have seen him;
I have promised that some one should watch for him, and give him instant notice if any new object should appear in sight.
